00271       /*
00272       * Implementations of the explicit specializations of the public
00273       * stress calculators computeStress(T& ) etc. for T = double,
00274       * Util::Vector and Util::Tensor simply call these private method
00275       * templates. This allows a single template method to be used to
00276       * compile the 3 relevant explicit specializations of each stress
00277       * calculator, while keeping the template implementations out of
00278       * this header file.
00279       */
00280 
00281       template <typename T>
00282       void computeVirialStressImpl(T& stress) const;
00283 
00284       #ifdef MCMD_LINK
00285       template <typename T>
00286       void computeLinkStressImpl(T& stress) const;
00287       #endif
00288 
00289    };
